cs155.jray

Class Color3D

  • java.lang.Object
    • cs155.jray.Color3D

  • public class Color3D
extends java.lang.Object
    This represents color objects, where the red, green, and blue components are non-negative doubles. When converting to a Color with multiply by 255 and coerce to integers in the range [0,255]. This class also has methods to add, multiply, and scale colors.

      create a color from its red green and blue components (assumed to be between 0 and 1)
